title: .ameba.yml
description: Configuration rules for the Crystal language Ameba linter

Excluded.title: Excluded files and paths
Excluded.description: An array of wildcards (or paths) to exclude from the source list

Version.description: The version of Ameba to limit rules to

Excluded.title: Excluded files and paths
Excluded.description: An array of wildcards (or paths) to exclude from the source list

Globs.title: Globbed files and paths
Globs.description: An array of wildcards (or paths) to include to the inspection

Documentation/Documentation.title: Documentation/Documentation
Documentation/Documentation.description:
Enforces public types to be documented
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Documentation/Documentation.html

Layout/LineLength.title: Layout/LineLength
Layout/LineLength.description:
Disallows lines longer than `MaxLength` number of symbols
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Layout/LineLength.html

Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition.title: Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition
Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition.description:
Reports repeated conditions used in case `when` expressions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition.html

Lint/ElseNil.title: Lint/ElseNil
Lint/ElseNil.description:
Disallows `else` blocks with `nil` as their body
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/ElseNil.html

Lint/HashDuplicatedKey.title: Lint/HashDuplicatedKey
Lint/HashDuplicatedKey.description:
Disallows duplicated keys in hash literals
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/HashDuplicatedKey.html

Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions.title: Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions
Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions.description:
Disallows assignments with literal values in control expressions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions.html

Lint/LiteralInCondition.title: Lint/LiteralInCondition
Lint/LiteralInCondition.description:
Disallows useless conditional statements that contain a literal in place of a variable or predicate function
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/LiteralInCondition.html

Lint/MissingBlockArgument.title: Lint/MissingBlockArgument
Lint/MissingBlockArgument.description:
Disallows yielding method definitions without block argument
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/MissingBlockArgument.html

Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang.title: Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang
Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang.description:
Identifies usage of `index/rindex/find/match` calls followed by `not_nil!`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang.html

Lint/PercentArrays.title: Lint/PercentArrays
Lint/PercentArrays.description:
Disallows some unwanted symbols in percent array literals
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/PercentArrays.html

Lint/RedundantStringCoercion.title: Lint/RedundantStringCoercion
Lint/RedundantStringCoercion.description:
Disallows redundant string conversions in interpolation
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/RedundantStringCoercion.html

Lint/RequireParentheses.title: Lint/RequireParentheses
Lint/RequireParentheses.description:
Disallows method calls with no parentheses and a logical operator in the argument list
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/RequireParentheses.html

Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition.title: Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition
Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition.description:
Reports `initialize` method definitions with a `self` receiver
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition.html

Lint/ShadowedException.title: Lint/ShadowedException
Lint/ShadowedException.description:
Disallows rescued exception that get shadowed
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/ShadowedException.html

Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar.title: Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar
Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar.description:
Disallows the usage of the same name as outer local variables for block or proc arguments
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar.html

Lint/SpecFilename.title: Lint/SpecFilename
Lint/SpecFilename.description:
Enforces spec filenames to have `_spec` suffix
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/SpecFilename.html

Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition.title: Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition
Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition.description:
Disallows top level operator method definitions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition.html

Lint/Typos.title: Lint/Typos
Lint/Typos.description:
Reports typos found in source files
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/Typos.html

Lint/UnneededDisableDirective.title: Lint/UnneededDisableDirective
Lint/UnneededDisableDirective.description:
Reports unneeded disable directives in comments
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/UnneededDisableDirective.html

Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier.title: Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier
Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier.description:
Disallows top level `protected` method visibility modifier
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier.html

Lint/VoidOutsideLib.title: Lint/VoidOutsideLib
Lint/VoidOutsideLib.description:
Disallows use of `Void` outside C lib bindings and `Pointer(Void)`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/VoidOutsideLib.html

Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression.title: Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression
Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression.description:
Reports missing spaces around macro expressions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression.html

Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.title: Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity
Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.description:
Disallows methods with a cyclomatic complexity higher than `MaxComplexity`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.html

Naming/AccessorMethodName.title: Naming/AccessorMethodName
Naming/AccessorMethodName.description:
Makes sure that accessor methods are named properly
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/AccessorMethodName.html

Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName.title: Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName
Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName.description:
Enforces that certain binary operator methods have their sole parameter name standardized
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName.html

Naming/ConstantNames.title: Naming/ConstantNames
Naming/ConstantNames.description:
Enforces constant names to be in screaming case
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/ConstantNames.html

Naming/Filename.title: Naming/Filename
Naming/Filename.description:
Enforces file names to be in underscored case
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/Filename.html

Naming/MethodNames.title: Naming/MethodNames
Naming/MethodNames.description:
Enforces method names to be in underscored case
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/MethodNames.html

Naming/QueryBoolMethods.title: Naming/QueryBoolMethods
Naming/QueryBoolMethods.description:
Reports boolean properties without the `?` suffix
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/QueryBoolMethods.html

Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName.title: Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName
Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName.description:
Makes sure that rescued exceptions variables are named as expected
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName.html

Naming/TypeNames.title: Naming/TypeNames
Naming/TypeNames.description:
Enforces type names in camelcase manner
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/TypeNames.html

Naming/VariableNames.title: Naming/VariableNames
Naming/VariableNames.description:
Enforces variable names to be in underscored case
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Naming/VariableNames.html

Performance/AnyAfterFilter.title: Performance/AnyAfterFilter
Performance/AnyAfterFilter.description:
Identifies usage of `any?` calls that follow filters
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/AnyAfterFilter.html

Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang.title: Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang
Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang.description:
Identifies usage of chained calls not utilizing the bang method variants
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang.html

Performance/CompactAfterMap.title: Performance/CompactAfterMap
Performance/CompactAfterMap.description:
Identifies usage of `compact` calls that follow `map`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/CompactAfterMap.html

Performance/ExcessiveAllocations.title: Performance/ExcessiveAllocations
Performance/ExcessiveAllocations.description:
Identifies usage of excessive collection allocations
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/ExcessiveAllocations.html

Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter.title: Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter
Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter.description:
Identifies usage of `first/last/first?/last?` calls that follow filters
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter.html

Performance/FlattenAfterMap.title: Performance/FlattenAfterMap
Performance/FlattenAfterMap.description:
Identifies usage of `flatten` calls that follow `map`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/FlattenAfterMap.html

Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock.title: Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock
Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock.description:
Identifies usage of `sum/product` calls that follow `map`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock.html

Performance/MinMaxAfterMap.title: Performance/MinMaxAfterMap
Performance/MinMaxAfterMap.description:
Identifies usage of `min/max/minmax` calls that follow `map`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/MinMaxAfterMap.html

Performance/SizeAfterFilter.title: Performance/SizeAfterFilter
Performance/SizeAfterFilter.description:
Identifies usage of `size` calls that follow filter
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Performance/SizeAfterFilter.html

Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax.title: Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax
Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax.description:
Encourages the use of `Array(T).new` over `[] of T`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax.html

Style/GuardClause.title: Style/GuardClause
Style/GuardClause.description:
Check for conditionals that can be replaced with guard clauses
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/GuardClause.html

Style/HashLiteralSyntax.title: Style/HashLiteralSyntax
Style/HashLiteralSyntax.description:
Encourages the use of `Hash(K, V).new` over `{} of K => V`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/HashLiteralSyntax.html

Style/HeredocEscape.title: Style/HeredocEscape
Style/HeredocEscape.description:
Recommends using the heredoc variant that escapes interpolation or control chars in a heredoc body
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/HeredocEscape.html

Style/HeredocIndent.title: Style/HeredocIndent
Style/HeredocIndent.description:
Recommends heredoc bodies are indented consistently
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/HeredocIndent.html

Style/IsAFilter.title: Style/IsAFilter
Style/IsAFilter.description:
Identifies usage of `is_a?/nil?` calls within filters
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/IsAFilter.html

Style/IsANil.title: Style/IsANil
Style/IsANil.description:
Disallows calls to `is_a?(Nil)` in favor of `nil?`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/IsANil.html

Style/LargeNumbers.title: Style/LargeNumbers
Style/LargeNumbers.description:
Disallows usage of large numbers without underscore
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/LargeNumbers.html

Style/MultilineCurlyBlock.title: Style/MultilineCurlyBlock
Style/MultilineCurlyBlock.description:
Disallows multi-line blocks using curly block syntax
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/MultilineCurlyBlock.html

Style/MultilineStringLiteral.title: Style/MultilineStringLiteral
Style/MultilineStringLiteral.description:
Disallows multiline string literals not using `<<-HEREDOC` markers
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/MultilineStringLiteral.html

Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.title: Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition
Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.description:
Disallows redundant parentheses around control expressions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.html

Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters.title: Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters
Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters.description:
Enforces the consistent usage of `%`-literal delimiters
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters.html

Style/UnlessElse.title: Style/UnlessElse
Style/UnlessElse.description:
Disallows the use of an `else` block with the `unless`
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/UnlessElse.html

Style/VerboseBlock.title: Style/VerboseBlock
Style/VerboseBlock.description:
Identifies usage of collapsible single expression blocks
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/VerboseBlock.html

Style/WhileTrue.title: Style/WhileTrue
Style/WhileTrue.description:
Disallows `while` statements with a `true` literal as condition
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Style/WhileTrue.html

Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction
Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction.description:
Recommends that call arguments to certain macros have type restrictions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction.html

Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction
Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction.description:
Recommends that method parameters have type restrictions
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction.html

Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction
Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction.description:
Recommends that methods have a return type restriction
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction.html

Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction.title: Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction
Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction.description:
Disallows proc literals without return type restriction
https://crystal-ameba.github.io/ameba/Ameba/Rule/Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction.html
